name: Mini Jam #116: Pocket Sized
description:
Game made for the mini jam pocket size: The movement is based on tiles

This game is played only with the mouse, waves of increasingly active enemies will appear and you will have to use modules to bounce balls on the enemies in order to overcome them. With each defeated enemy, you will get coins to buy new modules. The game ends either once your life is at 0, or after defeating the final boss (after 15min)

Let left click press to drag and drop a module

Right click to rotate a module on itself
